## Thank you for your contribution

We appreciate your time and effort in improving this project. Please complete the checklist and questions below to help reviewers focus quickly and effectively.  Don't take these AI questions as a negative view of your contribution it just helps us to better understand why something may be a certain way and know what we can and cannot ask.

## Summary

- What problem does this PR solve or feature does it add?
- What changed to solve it?
- Other Notes / information

## Validation

- How did you verify the change works?
- What edge cases did you test (if any)?

## AI-Assisted Development Disclosure

Please be transparent if AI tools were used.

1. Roughly what percentage of this PR was generated by AI?
   - [ ] <5%
   - [ ] 5-33%
   - [ ] 33-66%
   - [ ] 66-90%
   - [ ] 90-100%

2. Are there any sections you do not fully understand, or where you are unsure the AI made the right implementation choice?
   - [ ] No
   - [ ] Yes (please explain below)

3. How confident are you that this change addresses the root cause (not just symptoms)?
   - [ ] Low
   - [ ] Medium
   - [ ] High
   - [ ] Very High

## AI Code Review Checklist

For AI-generated or AI-assisted code, please confirm you reviewed the following things that AI can have a tendency to do and tried to minimize them:

- [ ] No unnecessary duplication ([DRY](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/software-engineering/dont-repeat-yourselfdry-in-software-development/) was followed; repeated logic was refactored appropriately).
- [ ] No avoidable hardcoded values/strings where parsing, configuration, or detection is more appropriate.
- [ ] Changes are scoped to the issue and avoid unrelated modifications.
- [ ] The final diff is concise and review-friendly.
